title: Can't login in after update the patch 8.2
body: 1. i can't login after i update the patch 8.2. What should i do????{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
What is preventing you from logging in? Does it say server not available, is it saying your credentials are wrong?

Assuming it's a problem with your client, try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If you think your account has been compromised **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
